textBeforeTable: Wave 1 (2006) [See Wave 2 version below] First, Id like to ask a few questions about your household. Including yourself, how many people live in this household? (Count as residents people for whom this is their primary residence only. Do not count students currently away at school as residents if they are living away at school at the time of the interview. Students can be counted if they are currently living at home.) (HR1W1) -- LOWEIGHT   All frequencies weighted by Household Roster Results & Summaries The PALS seeks to understand the impact of religion in everyday life, and ultimately the connections between religious change and other forms of change among diverse individuals and families over the course of their lives.
